section.title: dlg.list_ctx
section.para: Print all dialogs with associated context

section.title: dlg.dlg_list
section.para: Print dialog based on callid and optionally fromtag

section.title: dlg.dlg_list_ctx
section.para: Print dialog with associated context based on callid and optionally fromtag

section.title: dlg.end_dlg
section.para: End a given dialog based on [h_entry] [h_id]

section.title: dlg.profile_get_size
section.para: Returns the number of dialogs belonging to a profile

section.title: dlg.profile_list
section.para: Lists all the dialogs belonging to a profile

section.title: dlg.bridge_dlg
section.para: Bridge two SIP addresses in a call using INVITE(hold)-REFER-BYE mechanism: to, from, [outbound SIP proxy]

section.title: dlg.terminate_dlg
section.para: End a given dialog based on callid
